text: The Bardo National Museum (; ) is a national museum in Tunis, Tunisia. In March 2015, the museum was the site of a terrorist attack that left over twenty people dead. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:National museums Category:Tunisia Category:Tunis Category:Buildings and structures in Africa Category:19th-century establishments in Tunisia Category:1888 establishments
title: Bardo National Museum (Tunis)
